title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romantic novel about manners, upbringing, morality, and marriage.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale about the future.

description: A fantasy novel introducing Middle-earth and the adventures of Bilbo Baggins.

author: Harper Lee
description: A novel about racial injustice in the Deep South seen through a child's eyes.

title: Moby-Dick

author: Leo Tolstoy

description: A novel exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

description: A novel about a woman's struggle for independence and love.

description: A dystopian novel exploring technological and social control.

description: A story about teenage rebellion and alienation in postwar America.

author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

description: An epic poem about the journey of Odysseus returning home from the Trojan War.

title: The Iliad
author: Homer
description: Epic poem recounting the events of the Trojan War.

title: Wuthering Heights

description: A story of passion, revenge, and the destructive nature of obsession.

description: A coming-of-age novel exploring social class and personal growth.

description: A gothic novel about the dangers of unchecked scientific ambition.
